thread.section_title: About.com Germany Travel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: Oktoberfest 2013 in Munich

title: Oktoberfest 2013 in Munich
text:
Cab, car, train or subway? Here are the best ways to get to Theresienwiese , the traditional venue of Munich's Oktoberfest. More » GNTB/Rainer Kiedrowski 3. Oktoberfest Tips and Suggestions 
Can I take children to Oktoberfest? Should I reserve a table in an Oktoberfest beer hall? How much do I have to shell out for Oktoberfest beer? 
Find the answers here (plus what not to do ), and get helpful tips and information for your Oktoberfest visit. More » FVAmuc,Wilfried Hösl 4. Oktoberfest Beer Tents 
There are over 30 beer tents at Oktoberfest - so which one to go to? Let's find out which Oktoberfest tent is a good choice for you, whether you are bringing the kids, want to spot celebrities, or listen to the best brass bands. More » 
Do you want to make a reservation in an Oktoberfest beer tent? Check out our step-by-step guide on when and how to to do it. More » Andreas Rentz/Getty Images 
Oktoberfest is more than drinking beer and eating sausage - the festival is a colorful celebration of Bavarian culture and tradition. Here are the the best Oktoberfest events that you should not miss. More » Traditional Bavarian Hat at Oktoberfest. Andrew Amondson 
Want to celebrate Oktoberfest in style? Then get yourself a traditional Bavarian costume. Here is the guide to the perfect pair of leather pants ( Lederhosen ) and German dress ( Dirndl ). More » Erin Porter 8. What to eat at Oktoberfest (or anytime you're in Munich) 
Rich, rustic and hearty - this is not health food. Expect sausage for breakfast , Kaiser -sized hunks of meat paired with mountains of Sauerkraut and Knödel (potato dumplings). Whether you just need something to accompany your massive Mass of bier or want to literally take a bite out of Bavarian culture, here are 10 must-try German dishes for Oktoberfest (or anytime you are in Munich). 
Don't forget to finish it off with these Oktoberfest dessert option. More » Dave Morris
